name: Pagora: space fishing
description:
Planet 'Pagora' is an ideal place for space fishing. Ancient radioactive ruins attract space fishes - a source of clean energy that cost a lot on the black market, it's hard to imagine a more dangerous job, but today I'm flying there...

Move pressed LMB to adjust the size of photon lasso, when there will be only 2 space fishes in the circle (it become green) release the button
